articles.author: TN Sports Desk
articles.title: Pakistan Refuse To Play ODI Series In Sri Lanka After SLC Propose To Host Asia Cup 2023: Report - Times Now
articles.description: According to a report, PCB has turned down an offer from Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) to play a bilateral ODI series in the island nation in July, in retaliation for this whole Asia Cup 2023 fiasco.
